nodes.text: Balfron was a small terrestrial planet in the Dolomar sector. It had several casinos where planets could be won or lost in a game of sabacc, including The High Stakes Casino, where Han Solo arranged for Lando Calrissian to meet the Tonnika sisters as part of an elaborate prank.
Despite placing the planet in the Dolomar Sector, the in-game encyclopedia entry for Balfron in the PC game Star Wars: Rebellion claims it is located in the Outer Rim.
